22.10: Ofii ɔsoro baa fam;na omununkum kabii duruu nʼanan ase.
22.11: Ɔte kerubim so tui;gyaagyaa ne ho wɔ mframa ntaban so.
22.12: Ɔde sum kataa ne ho hyiae,ɔde osu mununkum dii nʼanim kan.
22.13: Hann kɛse hyerɛn wɔ nʼanim,na anyinam pa fii mu.
22.14: Awurade bobɔɔ mu fi ɔsoro;Ɔsorosoroni no teɛɛ mu dennen.
22.15: Ɔtow nʼagyan maa nʼatamfo hwetee;anyinam twa ma wɔyɛɛ basaa.
22.16: Awurade kasae,na wiase nnyinaso no nyinaa daa hɔ.Wotumi huu ɛpo ase,na asase fapem ho daa hɔ.
22.17: “Ofi ɔsoro baa fam besoo me mu;ɔtwee me fii asu a emu dɔ mu.
22.18: Ogyee me fii mʼatamfo a wɔyɛ den nsam,atamfo a wokyi me na wɔn ho yɛ den pa ara sen me.
22.19: Wɔbaa me so wɔ mʼamanehunu da,nanso Awurade pagyaw me.
22.20: Ɔde me baa baabi a bammɔ wɔ;ogyee me, efisɛ nʼani kum me ho.
22.21: “Awurade atua me papayɛ so ka;me bem a midi no, wahyɛ me anan mu.
22.22: Efisɛ manantew Awurade akwan so;mentwee me ho mfii me Nyankopɔn ho nkɔyɛɛ bɔne.
22.23: Ne mmara nyinaa gu mʼanim;mentwee me ho mfii ne nhyehyɛe ho.
22.24: Me ho nni asɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn anim;matwe me ho afi bɔne ho.
22.25: Awurade tuaa me papayɛ so ka,efisɛ minni fɔ wɔ nʼanim.
22.26: “Woda wo ho adi sɛ ɔnokwafo kyerɛ wɔn a wodi nokware,wɔn a wodi mu nso wo kyerɛ wɔn sɛ wodi mu.
22.27: Wuyi wo kronkronyɛ kyerɛ ɔkronkronni,nanso amumɔyɛfo de wukyi wɔn.
22.28: Wugye ahobrɛasefo,nanso wʼani kɔ ahantanfo so sɛ wobɛbrɛ wɔn ase.
22.29: Wo Awurade, woyɛ me kanea.Yiw, Awurade woma me sum dan hann.
22.30: Wʼahoɔden mu, metumi aka asraafokuw agu;me Nyankopɔn nti, mitumi foro ɔfasu.
22.31: “Onyankopɔn de, nʼakwan yɛ pɛ;Awurade bɔhyɛ nyinaa ba mu.Ɔyɛ nkataboma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ bammɔ wɔ ne mu.
22.32: Hena ne Onyankopɔn, gye sɛ Awurade?Hena ne ɔbotantim no, gye sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn?
22.33: Onyankopɔn ne mʼaban a ɛyɛ den;wagye me, na wama me kwan so ayɛ pɛ.
22.34: Ɔma mʼanammɔn ho yɛ hare sɛ ɔforote de;Ɔma me gyina sorɔnsorɔmmea.
22.35: Osiesie me ma ɔko;na me basa tumi kuntun kɔbere mfrafrae tadua.
22.36: Woama me wo nkwagye kyɛm.Wo mmoa ama mayɛ ɔkɛse.
22.37: Woabɔ kwan tɛtrɛɛ ama mʼanansɛnea me nkotodwe rengurow.
22.38: “Metaa mʼatamfo sɛee wɔn;mannyina kosii sɛ wodii nkogu.
22.39: Meyam wɔn, mebɔɔ wɔn hwee fam, na wɔantumi ansɔre;wɔhwehwee ase wɔ mʼanan ase.
22.40: Wohyɛɛ me ahoɔden maa ɔko;woaka mʼatamfo ahyɛ mʼanan ase.
22.41: Womaa wɔdan wɔn ani guanee,na mesɛe wɔn a wɔtan me nyinaa.
22.42: Wosu pɛɛ mmoa, nanso obiara ammegye wɔn.Wosu frɛɛ Awurade, nanso wannye wɔn so.
22.43: Meyam wɔn ma wɔyɛɛ sɛ asase so mfutuma;mepraa wɔn guu suka mu sɛ wura.
22.44: “Womaa me nkonimdi wɔ wɔn a wɔbɔ me kwaadu so.Woahwɛ sɛ mɛyɛ amanaman sodifo;na nnipa a minnim wɔn som me.
22.45: Ananafo brɛ wɔn ho ase ma me;wɔte me nka pɛ ara a, wɔde wɔn ho ma me.
22.46: Wɔn nyinaa bɔ huboa,na wɔde ahopopo fi wɔn nsraban mu ba.
22.47: “Awurade te ase! Ayeyi nka me botan,ma wɔmma Onyankopɔn, me nkwagye botan so.
22.48: Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔ wɔn a wɔhaw me so were;ɔka amanaman no hyɛ mʼase
22.49: na ogye me fi mʼatamfo nsam.Wode me si baabi a mʼatamfo nnu,wugye me fi atutuwpɛfo a wotia me nsam.
22.50: Awurade eyi nti, mɛkamfo wo wɔ amanaman mu, Ao Awurade.Mɛto ayeyi dwom ama wo din.
22.51: “Wode nkonimdi akɛse ama wo hene;woda ɔdɔ a ɛnsa da adi kyerɛ nea woasra no ngo,wode kyerɛ Dawid, ne nʼasefo afebɔɔ.”

23.1: Dawid Nsɛm A Etwa ToEyi ne Dawid nsɛm a etwaa to:“Dawid, Yisai ba barima aOnyankopɔn maa no nkɔso a ɛyɛ nwonwa,na Yakob Nyankopɔn sraa no ngo no,Israel nnwomhyehyɛfo mu otiban:
23.2: “Awurade honhom kasa fa me mu;ne nsɛm wɔ me tɛkrɛma so.
23.3: Israel Nyankopɔn kasae.Israel botan ka kyerɛɛ me se:‘Onipa a odi hene trenee mu,na ɔde Onyamesuro di hene no,
23.4: ɔte sɛ anɔpa hann,ɔte sɛ anɔpa a omununkum nni hɔ apueiwia hann;ɔte sɛ osutɔ akyi hyerɛn,na ɛma sare foforo pue fi asase mu.’
23.5: “Ɛyɛ me fi na Onyankopɔn ayi.Yiw, ɔne me ayɛ apam a ɛwɔ hɔ daa.Ne nhyehyɛe yɛ afebɔɔ, bi nni hɔ bio, na wɔasɔw ano.Ɔbɛhwɛ me yiyedi ne me nkɔso daa.
23.6: Na wɔn a wonnim Onyame no te sɛ nsɔe a wɔbɛtow agu,efisɛ wɔwowɔ nsa a eso mu no.
23.7: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi kɔ amia mu ansa na watwa wɔn agu;wɔde ogya bɛhyew wɔn dwerɛbee.”
23.8: Dawid DɔmmarimaDin a edidi so yi yɛ Dawid dɔmmarima:Nea odi kan ne Yoseb-Basebet a ofi Tahkemon, na ɔyɛ ɔsahene wɔ akofo akɛse Baasa bi so wɔ Dawid mmarima no mu. Ɔno na ɔde ne peaw kum atamfo akofo ahanwɔtwe wɔ ɔsa baako pɛ mu no.
23.9: Nea ɔto so abien wɔ baasa no mu no ne Dodo babarima Eleasar a ɔyɛ Ahohi aseni. Bere bi Eleasar ne Dawid ka bɔɔ mu, tew gyinae, de tiaa Filistifo bere a Israel asraafo no nyinaa aguan no.
23.10: Okunkum Filistifo no ara kosii sɛ afei, na ontumi mpagyaw ne peaw. Nanso Awurade maa no dii nkonim saa da no. Asraafo a wɔaka no ansan amma kosii bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkɔtase wɔn asade no.
23.11: Nea odi hɔ yɛ Sama a ɔyɛ Agee a ofi Harar babarima. Da koro bi, Filistifo no boaa wɔn ho ano wɔ Lehi, na wɔtow hyɛɛ Israelfo no so wɔ aseduafuw bi mu. Israel asraafo no guanee,
23.12: nanso Sama gyinaa ne nan so pintinn wɔ afuw no mfimfini, kaa Filistifo no gui. Enti Awurade ma odii nkonim.
23.13: Twabere bi a na Dawid wɔ Adulam ɔbodan mu no, Filisti asraafo bɛkyeree nsraban wɔ Refaim bon mu. Dawid akofo nimdefo aduasa no mu baasa sian kohyiaa no wɔ hɔ.
23.14: Saa bere no na Dawid te nsraban mu hɔ a na Filistifo asraafo no fa bi nso akɔtena Betlehem.
23.15: Dawid daa nʼakɔnnɔ adi se, “Ao, sɛ minya nsu pa a ɛwɔ Betlehem abura a ɛwɔ kurow no pon no ano hɔ no bi a, anka mɛnom.”
23.16: Enti baasa no bu faa Filistifo no mu kɔsaw nsu no bi fii abura no mu, de brɛɛ Dawid. Nanso wannom. Mmom, ohwie guu Awurade anim.
23.17: Ɔteɛɛ mu se, “Awurade ma ɛmpare me sɛ mɛnom eyi! Saa nsu yi som bo te sɛ saa mmarima yi a wɔde wɔn nkwa too hɔ, kɔsaw nsu yi brɛɛ me yi mogya.” Enti Dawid annom. Mmarimasɛm a Baasa no dii no nhwɛso bi ni.
23.18: Dawid Akofo Akɛse AduasaNa Yoab nua Seruia babarima Abisai nso dii Aduasa no anim. Da bi, ɔde ne peaw kum atamfo akofo ahaasa wɔ ɔsa baako pɛ mu. Saa akokodurusɛm yi nti ne din hyetaa sɛ Baasa no.
23.19: Abisai na ogyee din pa ara wɔ Aduasa no mu. Ɛwɔ mu, wannye din sɛ Baasa no ho de, nanso na ɔno ne Aduasa no safohene.
23.20: Na Yehoiada babarima Benaia nso yɛ ɔkofo kokodurufo a ofi Kabseel. Odii mmarimasɛm bebree a bi ne sɛ, okum Moab akofo akɛse baanu. Bere bi nso, ɔtaa gyata, ma wɔkɔtɔɔ amoa mu. Na sukyerɛmma atɔ, ama fam ayɛ toro de, nanso ɔkyeree gyata no, kum no.
23.21: Bere bi nso, ɔde abaaporiwa a na okura no kum Misraimni ɔkofo kɛse bi a na ɔno kura peaw. Benaia hwim peaw no fii Misraimni no nsam, na ɔde kum no.
23.22: Eyinom na Yehoiada babarima Benaia yɛe, ma ogyee din te sɛ Baasa no.
23.23: Na ɔwɔ anuonyam sen wɔn a na wɔfra Aduasa no mu no biara, nanso na ɔnka Baasa no ho. Na Dawid yɛɛ no nʼawɛmfo no so sahene.
23.24: Wɔn a aka a na wɔfra Aduasa no mu no ni:Yoab nuabarima Asahel;Dodo a ofi Betlehem babarima Elhanan;
23.25: Sama a ofi Harod;Elika a ofi Harod;
23.26: Heles a ofi Palti;Ira, Ikes a ofi Tekoa babarima;
23.27: Abieser a ofi Anatot;Sibekai a ofi Husa;
23.28: Salmon a ofi Ahoa;Maharai a ofi Netofa;
23.29: Heleb, Baana a ofi Netofa babarima;Itai, Ribai a ofi Gibea (Benyamin abusuakuw mu) babarima;
23.30: Benaia a ofi Piraton;Hidai a ofi Nahale-Gaas;
23.33: Yonatan, Sama a ofi Harar babarima;Sarar, Ahiam a ofi Maaka babarima;
23.34: Elifelet, Ahasbai a ofi Maaka babarima;Eliam, Ahitofel a ofi Gilo babarima;
23.35: Hesro a ofi Karmel;Paarai a ofi Arba;
23.36: Igal, Natan a ofi Soba babarima;Bani a ofi Gad;
23.37: Selek a ofi Amon;Naharai a ofi Beerot (Yoab akodekurafo);
23.38: Ira a ofi Yitri;Gareb a ofi Yitri;
23.39: Hetini Uria.Wɔn nyinaa dodow yɛ aduasa ason.

24.1: Dawid Kan NnipaBio, Awurade abufuw baa Israel so nti, ɔhyɛɛ Dawid sɛ ɔmfa nnipakan so nhaw wɔn a wɔwɔ Israel ne Yuda nyinaa. Awurade see Dawid sɛ, “Kɔ na kɔkan Israelfo ne Yudafo nyinaa.”
24.2: Enti ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ ne sahene Yoab se, “Kan nnipa a wɔwɔ asase yi so nyinaa, efi Dan a ɛwɔ atifi fam, de besi Beer-Seba a ɛwɔ anafo fam, na ama mahu nnipa dodow a wɔwɔ ha.”
24.3: Na Yoab buaa ɔhene no se, “Awurade mma wo ntena ase kosi sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ wʼahenni yi mu ase bɛterɛw mmɔho ɔha. Na adɛn nti na wopɛ sɛ woyɛ eyi?”
24.4: Na ɔhene no hyɛɛ no ketee sɛ, wɔnkan nnipa nti, Yoab ne nʼadwumayɛfo kɔkan nnipa a wɔwɔ Israel.
24.5: Nea edi kan no, wotwaa Yordan kɔtenaa Aroer, kurow a ɛwɔ obon no anafo a ɛkyerɛ Gad no. Afei, wɔkɔɔ Yaser,
24.6: toaa so koduu Gilead a ɛwɔ Tatim-hodsi, toaa so kɔɔ Dan Yaan ne Sidon fa mu.
24.7: Afei, wɔbaa Tiro aban mu ne Hewifo ne Kanaanfo nkuropɔn nyinaa mu. Wɔkɔɔ Yuda anafo, koduu Beer-Seba de wiei.
24.8: Wowurawuraa asase no nyinaa so, de asram akron ne nnafua aduonu wiee nnipakan no, san kɔɔ Yerusalem.
24.9: Yoab de ne nnipa dodow a wonyae brɛɛ ɔhene no. Na mmarima a wɔadu sogyadi mfe so wɔ Israel no dodow yɛ mpem ahanwɔtwe, na mpem ahannum nso wɔ Yuda.
24.10: Dawid Bɔne So AtemmuDawid kan nnipa no nyinaa wiei no, nʼahonim buu no fɔ, nti ɔka kyerɛɛ Awurade se, “Nea meyɛe yi nti, mayɛ bɔne. Enti Awurade, mesrɛ wo, yi saa afɔbu yi fi wo somfo so. Mayɛ nkwaseade.”
24.11: Ade kyee no, Awurade asɛm baa odiyifo Gad a ɔyɛ Dawid ɔdehufo nkyɛn se:
24.12: “Kɔka kyerɛ Dawid sɛ, Sɛnea Awurade se ni: ‘Mede nsɛm abiɛsa reto wʼanim. Yi mu baako na menyɛ ntia wo.’ ”
24.13: Enti Gad kɔɔ Dawid nkyɛn kobisaa no se, “Ɔkɔm mmra wʼasase yi so mfe abiɛsa ana? Anaa, atamfo a wogu wo so no wubeguan wɔn asram abiɛsa? Anaa, ɔyaredɔm mmra wo man yi mu nnansa? Enti afei, dwene ho yiye, na ma minhu mmuae a memfa nkɔma Awurade.”
24.14: Dawid ka kyerɛɛ Gad se, “Yɛwɔ ahohiahia mu. Momma yɛmfa yɛn ho nhyɛ Awurade nsa, efisɛ nʼadɔe dɔɔso; nanso mma me nkɔtɔ nnipa nsam.”
24.15: Enti Awurade tow ɔyaredɔm guu Israel so anɔpa no ma edii nnansa. Na nnipa mpem aduɔson fii Dan kosi Beer-Seba wuwui.
24.16: Bere a ɔbɔfo no reyɛ ahoboa akɔsɛe Yerusalem no, Awurade nuu ne ho wɔ asɛm no ho, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Eye! Gyae.” Saa bere no na Awurade bɔfo no adu Yebusini Arauna awiporowbea hɔ.
24.17: Bere a Dawid huu ɔbɔfo no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Awurade se, “Me na mayɛ bɔne. Eyinom de wonnim ho hwee, dɛn na wɔayɛ? Ma wo bɔfo nsɛe me ne me fifo.”
24.18: Dawid Si AfɔremukaDa no, Gad kɔɔ Dawid nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Kɔ na kosi afɔremuka ma Awurade wɔ Yebusini Arauna awiporowbea hɔ.”
24.19: Na Dawid kɔyɛɛ nea Awurade hyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no.
24.20: Bere a Arauna huu sɛ ɔhene ne ne mmarima reba no, opue bɛkotow ɔhene, de nʼanim butuw fam.
24.21: Arauna bisae se, “Adɛn nti na woaba, me wura?”Dawid buae se, “Merebɛtɔ awiporowbea hɔ, na masi afɔremuka wɔ hɔ ama Awurade, sɛnea Awurade bɛma ɔyaredɔm no agyae.”
24.22: Arauna ka kyerɛɛ Dawid se, “Me wura fa na fa yɛ nea wopɛ. Nantwi a wɔde bɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre ni. Wubetumi de awiporowbea nnua ne nantwi mpamho nnua no ayɛ nnyina wɔ afɔremuka no so.
24.23: Mede ne nyinaa bɛma wo, na mesrɛ se, Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn nnye afɔre yi.”
24.24: Na ɔhene no buaa Arauna se, “Dabi da, mepɛ sɛ mɛtɔ, na merentumi mmɔ ɔhyew afɔre mma Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, a mammɔ ho ka biara.”Enti Dawid tuaa dwetɛ bɛyɛ gram ahannum aduoson anum () de tɔɔ awiporowbea ne nantwi no.
24.25: Dawid sii afɔremuka wɔ hɔ maa Awurade, na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne asomdwoe afɔre hɔ. Na Awurade tiee ne mpaebɔ maa ɔyaredɔm no gyaee.
